answers.answer: Hello,From the symptoms it can be due to urinary tract infection or prostatitis. Symptoms of UTI are frequent urination, burning sensation during urination, passing of blood in urine and even fever. The most common causes of repeated UTIs are kidney stones and diabetes mellitus. The other causes can be due to nerve pain or hernia pain.Making a diagnosis of a urinary tract infection includes performing a urinalysis test, which checks for the presence of pus, white blood cells, and bacteria in the urine, which point to a urinary tract infection. A urine culture and sensitivity is usually performed to find the exact microorganism that is causing the infection.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

I have been to three doctors and most of them are unable to figure out the reasons for the pain.when i have the pain , i have the urge to urinatate frequently and and feel discomfort in the abdonmen.I have been to urlogisits / STD specialist. but was not able to get clear idea on what exacty is the cause for this pain.Thanks to advice !
title: Pain in penis
